review: This has a nice smell, and is good for maintaining the wood on the neck of your guitar. Best used when replacing strings, so you can apply while the strings are off.
This is a wonderfual addition to help maintain the humidity for your guitar, this product is recommended by Taylor guitars.
This can work, but if you already use a guitar stand then it is a waste of money. It will work if you use your guitar next to the a table.
My husband usese this capo almost everytine he plays his guitar. His old one lasted about 10 years. Worth the cost.
These strings are a little more money than the average strings, but they last longer. Great for the dedicated guitar player.
